I took the time to make this TPB account, only to tell that the Goodperson542 crack DOES manage to start the game.

You just don't get any further than starting, because it says there is a problem with the internet connection.

The way to start:

1: Put MadCHook.dll in your system32 folder

2: Start MCHEvaluation.exe, don't shut it down until you shut down the game.

3: Start cppInjector.exe, and load the "logger.dll" as a module.

4: Type "UbisoftGameLauncher.exe"  as the name of the victim, and check the box above it.

5: Put UbisoftGameLauncher.exe included in the crack folder in your C:\Program Files (x86)\Ubisoft\Ubisoft Game Launcher Folder (overwrite the one that is already there, if there isn't one you're doing something wrong or you have the wrong path.).

6: Go to the CDKey bypass folder, and run the .exe in it, point it to the ubisoftgamelauncher.exe you have just put in your C:\ drive, and press "apply patch".

7: Now just start the game using HAWX2.exe (you need to have an ubi account and login, after that it'll start)
